author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member recently hired its first public information specialist but instead of proactively improving their communications with the public, the position is overwhelmed with responding to Public Records Act requests.  
How do manage/control/keep up with, public record requests and who in your organization is responsible for responding to requests?
Thank you!
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation

title: Managing Public Records Act Requests
